project: Mango POS Store App - Book & FrontDesk TDD
description: TDD test coverage for Book and FrontDesk modules

tasks.name: Book utils - timeSlotCalculation
tasks.description: Test time slot calculation utilities used in booking calendar
tasks.notes: No separate utils file exists - logic is inline in components

tasks.name: Book AppointmentCard render
tasks.description: Test AppointmentCard component rendering with different appointment states

tasks.name: Book StatusBadge component
tasks.description: Test StatusBadge renders correct colors and text for each status

tasks.name: Book TimeSlot component
tasks.description: Test TimeSlot component click handling and availability display

tasks.name: Book StaffChip component
tasks.description: Test StaffChip displays staff info and handles selection

tasks.name: FrontDesk shared timeUtils
tasks.description: Test FrontDesk time utilities for wait time calculations

tasks.name: FrontDesk SearchBar component
tasks.description: Test SearchBar input handling and search callbacks

tasks.name: FrontDesk ViewModeToggle
tasks.description: Test view mode toggle between different display modes

tasks.name: FrontDesk useTicketModals hook
tasks.description: Test ticket modal state management hook

tasks.name: FrontDesk ErrorBoundary
tasks.description: Test error boundary catches and displays errors correctly

tasks.name: Book CalendarHeader component
tasks.description: Test CalendarHeader navigation, date display, and view controls

tasks.name: Book QuickActionsBar component
tasks.description: Test quick action buttons and callback handlers

tasks.name: Book FilterPanel component
tasks.description: Test filter controls for status, staff, and services

tasks.name: FrontDesk FrontDeskHeader component
tasks.description: Test header with title, actions, and responsive layout

tasks.name: FrontDesk CreateTicketButton component
tasks.description: Test create ticket button states and click handling

tasks.name: FrontDesk EmptyState and Skeleton
tasks.description: Test empty state display and skeleton loading components

tasks.name: Book ViewModeDropdown component
tasks.description: Test view mode dropdown selection and toggle behavior

tasks.name: Book skeleton components
tasks.description: Test Book skeleton loading components

tasks.name: FrontDesk MobileTabBar component
tasks.description: Test mobile tab bar navigation and active states

tasks.name: FrontDesk FrontDeskMetrics component
tasks.description: Test metrics display and calculations

tasks.name: FrontDesk FrontDeskSubTabs component
tasks.description: Test sub-tab navigation and selection

tasks.name: FrontDesk FloatingActionButton component
tasks.description: Test floating action button variants and click handling

tasks.name: Book EmptyState component
tasks.description: Test empty state display with type variants (calendar, walkins, search)

tasks.name: Book DatePickerModal component
tasks.description: Test date picker calendar navigation and selection

tasks.name: Book BookErrorBoundary component
tasks.description: Test error boundary error catching and reset functionality

tasks.name: Book DraggableAppointment component
tasks.description: Test drag-and-drop functionality, drop zones, batch selection, and undo/redo hook

tasks.name: Book WalkInCard component
tasks.description: Test walk-in client card display with paper-ticket aesthetic, waiting time colors, and actions

tasks.name: FrontDesk AddNoteModal component
tasks.description: Test note modal with keyboard shortcuts (Cmd+Enter, Escape), character count, and save behavior

tasks.name: Book StaffColumn component
tasks.description: Test staff schedule column with drag-drop, appointments, and time slots

tasks.name: Book CommandPalette component
tasks.description: Test keyboard command palette with cmdk, visibility, actions, and keyboard shortcuts

tasks.name: FrontDesk SectionErrorBoundary component
tasks.description: Test section-level error boundaries with pre-configured variants

tasks.name: Book WeekView component
tasks.description: Test 7-day calendar view with appointments, today highlight, and status colors

tasks.name: Book StaffFilterDropdown component
tasks.description: Test staff filter dropdown with selection states, close behaviors, and checkmarks

tasks.name: Book StaffServicesPanel component
tasks.description: Test staff and service selection panel with category pills, search, and disabled states

tasks.name: Book MonthView component
tasks.description: Test monthly calendar grid with appointment dots, date grouping, and status colors

tasks.name: Book AgendaView component
tasks.description: Test list-format appointment view with date grouping, time formatting, and services display

tasks.name: Book ClientPreviewPopover component
tasks.description: Test client preview card with stats, favorites, notes, and quick actions (Call/SMS/Profile)

tasks.name: Book QuickBookBar component
tasks.description: Test floating client search bar with quick booking functionality and keyboard shortcuts

tasks.name: FrontDesk MobileTeamSection component
tasks.description: Test mobile-optimized team view with filters, search, and view mode toggle

tasks.name: Book OneTapBookingCard component
tasks.description: Test AI-powered instant booking card with confidence badge, date/time formatting, and toast notifications

tasks.name: Book ClientJourneyTimeline component
tasks.description: Test client visit history timeline with insights, loyalty tiers, churn risk, and predictions

tasks.name: Book RevenueDashboard component
tasks.description: Test real-time revenue tracking with goals, opportunities, trend indicators, and breakdown

tasks.name: Book HeatmapCalendarView component
tasks.description: Test visual density calendar with utilization/revenue/appointments color modes and time slots

tasks.name: Book AppointmentContextMenu component
tasks.description: Test right-click context menu with status-based actions, click handlers, and keyboard shortcuts

tasks.name: Book SmartBookingPanel component
tasks.description: Test AI-powered booking suggestions with client info, quick booking, and service/staff/time suggestions

tasks.name: Book WalkInSidebar component
tasks.description: Test draggable walk-in queue panel with collapse states, filtering, and drag-and-drop
